author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Exclusive: Shivarajkumar's look from Tagaru | Kannada Movie News - Times of India
text:
Kannada star Shivarajkumar rocks the tough cop look in this exclusive still from the sets of Tagaru . In this Kannada film, directed by Suri , Shivarajkumar adds a new charm to the job of a cop by
'chasing crime and criminals'. The film is currently being shot in Bengaluru.
